speaker.whotheyare: Dallas Taylor is the host of "Twenty Thousand Hertz," a podcast about sound.
speaker.whylisten: Dallas Taylor is the host and creator of Twenty Thousand Hertz, a lovingly crafted podcast that reveals the stories behind the world's most interesting sounds and is a part of the TED family of podcasts. He is also the creative director of Defacto Sound, a sound design company where he has led thousands of high-profile projects ranging from blockbuster trailers and advertising campaigns to Sundance award-winning films and major television series. Taylor is a regular contributor to major publications and a respected thought leader on the narrative power of sound.
